Parameters: the id of the drawable resource.
setMaskedWalletDetailsBackgroundResource.Description: Sets the drawable resource id for the masked wallet details view background. This will override the drawable defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@ and background color which was previously set.

setBuyButtonText(int).Description: Sets text for the buy button. This will override the buy button text defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@. See @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#BuyButtonText_E@ for the list of possible values. Defaults to @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#BuyButtonText#BUY_WITH_GOOGLE_E@.

Parameters: the type of the logo image.
setMaskedWalletDetailsLogoImageType(int).Description: Sets the type of the wallet image logo in masked wallet details view. See @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletLogoImageType_E@ for the list of possible values. Defaults to @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletLogoImageType#CLASSIC_E@. This will override the image type defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@.

Parameters: id of a style defined in xml
setStyleResourceId(int).Description: Sets resource id of the style which will be used to customize wallet fragment UI. If not set explicitly the default style @B_com#google#android#gms#R#style#WalletFragmentDefaultStyle_E@ will be used. In most cases you will need to customize the style of the wallet fragment so that the UI of the fragment better matches the UI of the application.

setBuyButtonAppearance(int).Description: Sets the appearance of the buy button. See @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#BuyButtonAppearance_E@ for the list of possible values. Defaults to @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#BuyButtonAppearance#CLASSIC_E@. This will override the buy button appearance defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@.

Parameters: the id of the drawable resource.
setMaskedWalletDetailsButtonBackgroundRe.Description: Sets the drawable resource id for the masked wallet details "Change" button background. This will override the background defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@ and color previously set for the button background.

Parameters: the id of a TextAppearance style
setMaskedWalletDetailsHeaderTextAppearan.Description: Sets text appearance for the headers describing masked wallet details. This will override the text appearance defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@.

writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel dest, int flags)

setBuyButtonWidth(int).Description: Specifies a width for the buy button. The width includes a padding of 8dp (4dp on each side). The padding is used for a border around the button in pressed and focused states. A minimum width is enforced, and is computed from the height of the button and the width of the button text. This will override the buy button width defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@.

Parameters: the color as defined in android.graphics.Color
setMaskedWalletDetailsLogoTextColor(int).Description: Sets the color for the masked wallet details logo text. This will override the text color defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@.

Parameters: the id of a TextAppearance style
setMaskedWalletDetailsTextAppearance(int.Description: Sets text appearance for the masked wallet details. This will override the text appearance defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@.

setBuyButtonHeight(int).Description: Specifies a height for the buy button. The height includes a padding of 8dp (4dp on each side). The padding is used for a border around the button in pressed and focused states. The range of height supported is 40dp~72dp. This will override the buy button height defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@.

Parameters: the color as defined in android.graphics.Color
setMaskedWalletDetailsButtonBackgroundCo.Description: Sets the color for the masked wallet details "Change" button background. This will override the background defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@ and drawable resource id which was previously set for button background.

Parameters: unit of the height value. See constants starting with UNIT_ in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#Dimension_E@ for a list of supported units
setBuyButtonHeight(int, float).Description: Specifies a height for the buy button. The height includes a padding of 8dp (4dp on each side). The padding is used for a border around the button in pressed and focused states. The range of height supported is 40dp~72dp. This will override the buy button height defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@.
setBuyButtonHeight(int, float).FullName: public WalletFragmentStyle setBuyButtonHeight (int unit, float height)

Parameters: unit of the width value. See constants starting with UNIT_ in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#Dimension_E@ for a list of supported units
setBuyButtonWidth(int, float).Description: Specifies a width for the buy button. The width includes a padding of 8dp (4dp on each side). The padding is used for a border around the button in pressed and focused states. A minimum width is enforced, and is computed from the height of the button and the width of the button text. This will override the buy button width defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@.
setBuyButtonWidth(int, float).FullName: public WalletFragmentStyle setBuyButtonWidth (int unit, float width)

Parameters: the color as defined in android.graphics.Color
setMaskedWalletDetailsBackgroundColor(in.Description: Sets the color for the masked wallet details view background. This will override the color defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@ and background drawable which was previously set.

Parameters: the id of a TextAppearance style
setMaskedWalletDetailsButtonTextAppearan.Description: Sets the text appearance for the masked wallet details "Change" button text. This will override the text appearance defined in any style passed in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentStyle#setStyleResourceId_E@.

ClassDesc: Defines attributes to customize the look and feel of @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragment_E@, to be used in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentOptions#Builder#setFragmentStyle_E@. You may also specify these attributes using custom XML tags in a style resource and either add wallet:fragmentStyle="@style/MyWalletFragmentCustomStyle" to your <fragment> tag or pass the id of the style resource in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#fragment#WalletFragmentOptions#Builder#setFragmentStyle_E@. See @B_com#google#android#gms#R#style#WalletFragmentDefaultStyle_E@ for an example of the wallet fragment style.
